channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Verify Gateway (IVG)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Verify Gateway (IVG)

item.title: CVE-2020-4385|2024-09-16T17:49:18.666Z -- ibm -- verify%20gateway%20%28ivg%29
item.description: IBM Verify Gateway (IVG) 1.0.0 and 1.0.1 contains hard-coded credentials, such as a password or cryptographic key, which it uses for its own inbound authentication, outbound communication to external components, or encryption of internal data. IBM X-Force ID: 179266.

item.title: CVE-2020-4397|2024-09-16T16:53:52.620Z -- ibm -- verify%20gateway%20%28ivg%29
item.description: IBM Verify Gateway (IVG) 1.0.0 and 1.0.1 transmits sensitive information in plain text which could be obtained by an attacker using man in the middle techniques. IBM X-Force ID: 179428.

item.title: CVE-2020-4405|2024-09-16T16:58:17.739Z -- ibm -- verify%20gateway%20%28ivg%29
item.description: IBM Verify Gateway (IVG) 1.0.0 and 1.0.1 could disclose potentially sensitive information to an authenticated user due to world readable log files. IBM X-Force ID: 179484.
